android.widget
接口 SpinnerAdapter

所有超级接口：
Adapter
所有已知实现类：
ArrayAdapter, BaseAdapter, CursorAdapter, ResourceCursorAdapter, SimpleAdapter, SimpleCursorAdapter
public interface SpinnerAdapter
extends Adapter

Extended Adapter that is the bridge between a Spinner and its data. A spinner adapter allows to define two different views: one that shows the data in the spinner itself and one that shows the data in the drop down list when the spinner is pressed.

字段摘要
 
从接口 android.widget.Adapter 继承的字段
IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION
 
方法摘要
 View getDropDownView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
          Get a View that displays in the drop down popup the data at the specified position in the data set.
 
从接口 android.widget.Adapter 继承的方法
getCount, getItem, getItemId, getItemViewType, getView, getViewTypeCount, hasStableIds, isEmpty, registerDataSetObserver, unregisterDataSetObserver
 

方法详细信息

getDropDownView

View getDropDownView(int position,
                     View convertView,
                     ViewGroup parent)

Get a View that displays in the drop down popup the data at the specified position in the data set.

参数：
position - index of the item whose view we want.
convertView - the old view to reuse, if possible. Note: You should check that this view is non-null and of an appropriate type before using. If it is not possible to convert this view to display the correct data, this method can create a new view.
parent - the parent that this view will eventually be attached to
返回：
a View corresponding to the data at the specified position.
